data.message: Thanks for helping us remember. I've always kind of used FB as a journal. Key points/moments in my life. I was horrible at writing in daily journals in school when they made you do it! I love the memories feature you added. It's so great to see what happened each day a year or so many ago. I've used it to watch my kids grow and stay in touch with friends I haven't seen in years. Thank you for making such an awesome venue for doing so.

replies.message: Thanks for including us in your daily life, Wendy! This made our day. :) -Jordan

I agree! I hadn't realized it, but I too have used this as kind of a journal! I love that memory feature, and "year in review video " that comes out. I am able to be in touch with my 87 year old cousin to my Father through FB. I even found my old roommate,  who had moved away in 1984. We have gotten together once already and are planning a reunion of old housemates!  I love FB!
